arien.name: Noble Blade
arien.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
Before the attack: You may move another
unit that is adjacent to the target 1 space.
~(\"Another unit\" never includes you).

arien.name: Ceremonial Blade
arien.description:
Target a hero adjacent to you.
Before the attack: You may move a minion
 that is adjacent to the target 1 space.

arien.name: Spell Break
arien.description:
**This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius cannot
perform skill actions, except on gold cards.
~(Skill is an action type. Other actions are unaffected.)

arien.name: Living Tsunami
arien.description:
Once per turn, before performing an
Attack action, you may move 1 space.

arien.name: Aspiring Duelist
arien.description:
Ignore all minion defense modifiers.
~(This includes your minions, as well as the enemy minions).

arien.name: Dangerous Current
arien.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. Before the
attack: Up to 1 enemy hero in any of the
2 spaces in a straight line directly behind
the target discards a card, or is defeated.

arien.name: Liquid Leap
arien.description:
Place yourself into a space in range
without a spawn point and not adjacent
to an empty spawn point.

arien.name: Expert Duelist
arien.description:
Ignore all minion defense modifiers.
**This turn:** You are immune to attack actions
of all enemy heroes, except this attacker.

arien.name: Raging Stream
arien.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. Before the
 attack: Up to 1 enemy hero in any of the
3 spaces in a straight line directly behind
the target discards a card, or is defeated.

arien.name: Magical Current
arien.description:
Place yourself into a space in range
without a spawn point and not adjacent
to an empty spawn point.

arien.name: Slippery Ground
arien.description:
**This turn:** Enemy heroes adjacent
to you cannot fast travel, or move more
than 1 space with a movement action.

arien.name: Rogue Wave
arien.description:
Target a unit in range.
After the attack: You may push an enemy
unit adjacent to you up to 2 spaces.

arien.name: Arcane Whirlpool
arien.description:
Swap with an enemy minion in range.
~(Swap places with the target. This is not movement).

arien.name: Master Duelist
arien.description:
Ignore all minion defense modifiers.
**This round:** You are immune to attack actions
of all enemy heroes, except the attacker.

arien.name: Violent Torrent
arien.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. Before the
attack: Up to 1 enemy hero in any of the 5
spaces in a straight line directly behind the
target discards a card, or is defeated.
May repeat once on a different unit.

arien.name: Stranger Tide
arien.description:
Place yourself into a space in
range without a spawn point.

arien.name: Deluge
arien.description:
**This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius
cannot fast travel, or move more than
1 space with a movement action.

arien.name: Tidal Blast
arien.description:
Target a unit in range.
After the attack: You may push an enemy
unit adjacent to you up to 3 spaces.

arien.name: Ebb and Flow
arien.description:
Swap with an enemy minion in range;
if it was adjacent to you, may repeat once.

bain.name: Dead or Alive
bain.description:
You may give a hero in radius a ::marker_bounty:: bounty
marker. The hero with a bounty marker
spends 1 additional ::life_counters:: life counter when
defeated. You may then **choose one â€”**
>>An enemy hero adjacent to you discards
>a card, if able.
>>Defeat a minion adjacent to you.

bain.name: Side Quest
bain.description:
Up to 1 adjacent enemy hero discards a
card, if able. Give a hero in radius
a ::marker_bounty:: bounty marker.
The hero with a bounty marker spends 1
additional ::life_counters:: life counter when defeated.

bain.name: Get over here!
bain.description:
Target a unit in a straight line and in range,
with no obstacles between you. Then move
that unit towards you by the shortest valid
path, until it is adjacent to you. **This turn:**
If it is an enemy unit, it cannot move.

bain.name: A Complicated Profession
bain.description:
After you perform a basic skill,
an enemy hero adjacent to you
discards a card, or is defeated.

bain.name: A Game of Chance
bain.description:
An enemy hero in radius with 2 or more
cards in hand discards a card facedown.
Name a color and reveal that card.
If it's not the color you named, gain 1 coin
and the enemy hero may retrieve their card.

bain.name: Light Crossbow
bain.description:
Target a minion adjacent to you, or a hero
in range, and in a straight line, with no
other units, or terrain, between you.

bain.name: Close Call
bain.description:
Block the attack. The attacker may swap
their attack card with a card in their hand.
~(The card is swapped after the attack card is resolved).

bain.name: Dead Man's Hand
bain.description:
An enemy hero in radius with 2 or more
cards in hand discards a card facedown.
Name a color and reveal that card. If it's
not the color you named, gain 2 coins and
the enemy hero may retrieve their card.

bain.name: Heavy Crossbow
bain.description:
Target a unit in range, and in a straight line,
with no other units, or terrain, between you.

bain.name: Narrow Escape
bain.description:
Block the attack and move up to 1 space.
The attacker may swap their attack
card with a card in their hand.

bain.name: Drinking Buddies
bain.description:
A hero in radius may retrieve a discarded
card. **This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius may
not move to a space in a straight line from
them with a movement action.

bain.name: Hand Crossbow
bain.description:
+2 ::range_red:: Range if you target a hero with a
::marker_bounty:: bounty marker. target a unit in range.

bain.name: Vantage Point
bain.description:
**Next turn:** You may ignore restrictions to
have no obstacles between you and the
target when performing attacks and skills.

bain.name: We're Not Done Yet!
bain.description:
An enemy hero in radius with 2 or more cards
in hand discards a card facedown. Name a
color and reveal that card. If it's not the color
you named, gain 1 coin and the enemy hero
may retrieve their card. If they do, repeat once.

bain.name: Impaler
bain.description:
Target a unit in range, and in a straight
line, with no friendly units, or terrain,
between you. Before the attack: Up to
one enemy hero between you and the
target discards a card, or is defeated.

bain.name: Perfect Getaway
bain.description:
Block the attack and move up to 3 spaces
in a straight line. The attacker may swap
their attack card with a card in their hand.

bain.name: Another One!
bain.description:
A hero in radius may retrieve a discarded card.
**This turn and next turn:** Enemy heroes in
radius may not move to a space in a straight
line from them with a movement action.

bain.name: Hunter-Seeker
bain.description:
+2 ::range_red:: Range if you target a hero with a
::marker_bounty:: bounty marker. Target a unit in range.
If the target has a bounty marker, you may
repeat once on a different unit adjacent to you.

bain.name: High Ground
bain.description:
You may ignore obstacles.
**Next turn:** You may ignore restrictions to
have no obstacles between you can the
target when performing attacks and skills.

brogan.name: Onslaught
brogan.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack:
Move into the space it occupied.

brogan.name: Leap Forward
brogan.description:
Cannot target minions.
After the attack: If the target was defeated,
move into the space it occupied, if able.

brogan.name: Bulwark
brogan.description:
**Choose one â€”**
>>**This round:** You and friendly units in radius
>cannot be moved, pushed, swapped, or
>forced to move by enemy heroes.
>>If your discard is empty, retrieve this card.

brogan.name: One Man Army
brogan.description:
You count as 2 minions during minion battle.
If you would be removed during minion
battle, you lose the push instead.

brogan.name: Brutal Jab
brogan.description:
**Choose one â€”**
>>Remove a token adjacent to you.
>>Push an enemy minion adjacent to you
>up to 2 spaces.

brogan.name: Mad Dash
brogan.description:
Before the attack: Move 2 spaces in
a straight line to a space adjacent to
an enemy unit, then target that unit.
~(If you cannot make this move, you cannot attack).

brogan.name: Shield
brogan.description:
**This round:** If a friendly melee minion in
radius would be defeated, you may discard
a card. If you do, the minion is not defeated.

brogan.name: Crushing Punch
brogan.description:
Move up to 1 space, then **Choose one â€”**
>>Remove a token adjacent to you.
>>Push an enemy minion adjacent to you up
>to 2 spaces.

brogan.name: Bullrush
brogan.description:
Before the attack: Move 2 or 3 spaces in
a straight line to a space adjacent to an
enemy unit, then target that unit.

brogan.name: Bolster
brogan.description:
**This round:** If a friendly non-heavy minion in
radius would be defeated, you may discard a
card. If you do, the minion is not defeated.

brogan.name: Shield Bash
brogan.description:
An enemy hero adjacent to you, who
has played an attack card this turn
discards a card, if able.

brogan.name: Throwing Axe
brogan.description:
Before the attack: You may discard a card.
If you do, +2 ::range_red:: Range. Target a unit in range.

brogan.name: War Drummer
brogan.description:
A friendly hero in range may retrieve
a discarded card if either you, or that
hero, is adjacent to an enemy unit.

brogan.name: Savage Kick
brogan.description:
Move up to 1 space, then **Choose one â€”**
>>Remove a token adjacent to you.
>>Push an enemy unit adjacent to you up to
>2 spaces.

brogan.name: Furious Charge
brogan.description:
Before the attack: Move 2, 3, or 4 spaces
in a straight line to a space adjacent to an
enemy unit, then target that unit.

brogan.name: Fortify
brogan.description:
**This round:** If a friendly minion in radius
would be defeated, you may discard a card.
If you do, the minion is not defeated.

brogan.name: Counterattack
brogan.description:
An enemy hero adjacent to you, who
has played an attack card this turn
discards a card, or is defeated.

brogan.name: Throwing Spear
brogan.description:
Before the attack: You may discard a card.
+2 ::range_red:: Range if you have a card in the
discard. target a unit in range.

brogan.name: Master Skald
brogan.description:
A friendly hero in range may retrieve a
resolved or discarded card if either you,
or that hero, is adjacent to an enemy unit.

cutter.name: Walk the Plank
cutter.description:
**Choose one â€”**
>>Push an enemy hero adjacent to you up
>to 3 spaces; if that hero is pushed into
>another zone, that hero discards a card,
>or is defeated.
>>Defeat a minion adjacent to you.

cutter.name: Few More Steps
cutter.description:
Push an enemy hero adjacent to you
up to 3 spaces; if that hero is pushed
into another zone, that hero discards
a card, or is defeated.

cutter.name: Grappling Bolt
cutter.description:
Target an obstacle in range and in a straight
line, with no obstacles between you, ignore
immunity. Move any number of spaces in a
straight line towards that obstacle.

cutter.name: Legend of the Skies
cutter.description:
The first time each turn after you perform a
primary action, you may perform the primary
action of a card in the previous turn slot.

cutter.name: Barrage
cutter.description:
A enemy hero in radius adjacent to
another enemy unit, and not adjacent
to you, discards a card, if able.
~(The target hero must be adjacent to their friendly unit)

cutter.name: Daring Strike
cutter.description:
Before the attack: You may move
1 space and target a unit adjacent to
you in the direction of the move;
if you do, gain +2 ::attack_red:: Attack.
Otherwise, target a unit adjacent to you.

cutter.name: Brace for Impact
cutter.description:
Move 3 spaces in a straight line, ignoring
obstacles, to a space adjacent to an enemy
hero. That hero discards a card, if able.

cutter.name: Bombardment
cutter.description:
A enemy hero in radius adjacent to
another enemy unit, and not adjacent
to you, discards a card, if able.

cutter.name: Bold Thrust
cutter.description:
Before the attack: You may move 1 or 2
spaces in a straight line and target a unit
adjacent to you in the direction of the move;
if you do, gain +2 ::attack_red:: Attack.
Otherwise, target a unit adjacent to you.

cutter.name: Ramming Speed
cutter.description:
Move 3 or 4 spaces in a straight line, ignoring
obstacles, to a space adjacent to an enemy
hero. That hero discards a card, if able.

cutter.name: X Marks the Spot
cutter.description:
Place a coin in a space in radius.
**End of turn:** You may place yourself in
a space with a coin. Any hero in a space
with a coin gains 1 coin. Remove the coin.
~(A coin is not an obstacle. The space with a coin is empty.)

cutter.name: Evasive Shot
cutter.description:
Target a unit in range in a straight line, with
no other units, or terrain, between you.
After the attack: Move up to 2 spaces in a
straight line directly away from the target.

cutter.name: Mediocre!
cutter.description:
If the attacker has a card in their discard,
block the attack. If you do, the attacker
discards a card, if able.

cutter.name: Broadside
cutter.description:
A enemy hero in radius adjacent to
another enemy unit, and not adjacent
to you, discards a card, or is defeated.

cutter.name: Fearless Lunge
cutter.description:
Before the attack: You may move 1, 2 or 3
spaces in a straight line and target a unit
adjacent to you in the direction of the move;
if you do, gain +3 ::attack_red:: Attack.
Otherwise, target a unit adjacent to you.

cutter.name: Crashland
cutter.description:
Move 3, 4 or 5 spaces in a straight
line, ignoring obstacles, to a space
adjacent to an enemy hero.
That hero discards a card, if able.

cutter.name: A Fistful of Coins
cutter.description:
Place a coin in up to 2 spaces in radius.
**End of turn:** You may place yourself in a
space with a coin. Heroes in a space with
a coin gain 1 coin. Remove the coins.

cutter.name: Thumble Shot
cutter.description:
Target a unit in range in a straight line, with no
other units, or terrain, between you. After the
attack: Move up to 2 spaces in a straight line.

cutter.name: Pathetic!
cutter.description:
If the attacker has a card in their discard,
block the attack. If you do, the attacker
discards a card, or is defeated.

dodger.name: Dread Razor
dodger.description:
**Choose one â€”**
>>Target a unit adjacent to you.
>>If you are adjacent to an empty spawn point
>in the battle zone, target a unit in range.

dodger.name: Rusty Razor
dodger.description:
**Choose one â€”**
>>Target a hero adjacent to you.
>>If you are adjacent to an empty spawn point
>in the battle zone, target a hero in range.

dodger.name: Death Trap
dodger.description:
An enemy hero in radius who is
adjacent to an empty spawn point in
the battle zone discards a card, if able.

dodger.name: Tide of Darkness
dodger.description:
While you are performing an action, all spaces
count as if they were in the battle zone and
had a friendly minion spawn point.

dodger.name: Shield of Decay
dodger.description:
+2 ::defense_blue:: Defense if there are 2 or more empty
 spawn points in radius in the battle zone.

dodger.name: Littlefinger of Death
dodger.description:
**Choose one â€”**
>>Target a unit adjacent to you.
>>Target a hero in range who has one or
>more cards in the discard.

dodger.name: Dark Ritual
dodger.description:
If there are 2 or more empty minion spawn points
in radius in the battle zone, gain 1 coin.

dodger.name: Vampiric Shield
dodger.description:
+2 ::defense_blue:: Defense if there are 2 or more empty
spawn points in radius in the battle zone.

dodger.name: Finger of Death
dodger.description:
**Choose one â€”**
>>Target a unit adjacent to you.
>>Target a hero in range who has one or
>more cards in the discard.

dodger.name: Darker Ritual
dodger.description:
If there are 2 or more empty spawn points
 in radius in the battle zone, gain 2 coins.

dodger.name: Weakness
dodger.description:
**This turn:** Enemy heroes
in radius have -4 ::attack_silver:: Attack.
~(They can still attack, even with a negative attack value).

dodger.name: Burning Skull
dodger.description:
Target a unit in range. After the attack:
Move up to 1 minion adjacent to you
1 space, to a space not adjacent to you.

dodger.name: Necromancy
dodger.description:
Respawn a friendly minion in an empty friendly
spawn point adjacent to you in the battle zone.

dodger.name: Aegis of Doom
dodger.description:
+4 ::defense_blue:: Defense if there are 2 or more empty
spawn points in radius in the battle zone.

dodger.name: Middlefinger of Death
dodger.description:
**Choose one, or both** on different targets â€”
>>Target a unit adjacent to you.
>>Target a hero in range who has one or
>more cards in the discard.

dodger.name: Darkest Ritual
dodger.description:
If there are 2 or more empty spawn points in
radius in the battle zone, gain 2 coins. If you
have your Ultimate, gain an ::attack_silver:: Attack item.
~(Use any spare card from the box with the corresponding item.)

dodger.name: Enfeeblement
dodger.description:
**This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius have
-6 ::attack_silver:: Attack and cannot repeat actions.

dodger.name: Blazing Skull
dodger.description:
Target a unit in range. After the attack:
Move up to 2 minions adjacent to you
1 space each, to spaces not adjacent to you.

dodger.name: Necromastery
dodger.description:
Respawn a friendly minion in an empty friendly
spawn point in radius in the battle zone.

garrus.name: Angry Strike
garrus.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. +2 ::attack_gold:: Attack
if you have exactly one card in the discard.

garrus.name: Angry Swipe
garrus.description:
Target a hero adjacent to you. +2 ::attack_gold:: Attack
if you have exactly one card in the discard.

garrus.name: Chilling Howl
garrus.description:
You may discard a resolved card in the
previous turn slot. **This round:** Enemy
heroes in radius cannot fast travel, or move
more than 2 spaces with a movement action.

garrus.name: Death Grip
garrus.description:
While you are adjacent to exactly one enemy
hero, that hero cannot move or be moved,
placed, or swapped and you cannot be
moved, placed or swapped by enemy heroes.

garrus.name: Menace
garrus.description:
Move an enemy unit in radius to a space
outside of radius by the shortest valid path.

garrus.name: Trace
garrus.description:
Before the attack: If you have exactly
one card in the discard, you may move
up to 1 space to a space adjacent to
an enemy hero and target that hero.
Otherwise, target a unit adjacent to you.

garrus.name: Hold Ground
garrus.description:
If there is an enemy hero in range,
you may retrieve a discarded card.

garrus.name: Threaten
garrus.description:
Move an enemy unit in radius to a space
outside of radius by the shortest valid path.

garrus.name: Chase
garrus.description:
Before the attack: If you have exactly
one card in the discard, you may move
up to 2 spaces to a space adjacent to
an enemy hero and target that hero.
Otherwise, target a unit adjacent to you.

garrus.name: Make a Stand
garrus.description:
If there is an enemy hero in range,
you may retrieve a discarded card.

garrus.name: Shields Up!
garrus.description:
**This round:** You and friendly units in
radius are immune to ranged actions of
enemy heroes outside of radius. Cancel
this effect if you fast travel, or move.

garrus.name: Blunt Force
garrus.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack:
you may move up to 2 spaces to a space
adjacent to the nearest enemy hero.
Push that hero up to 2 spaces.

garrus.name: Light Pilum
garrus.description:
An enemy hero in range, not adjacent
to you, discards a card, if able.

garrus.name: Terrify
garrus.description:
Move an enemy unit in radius to a space
outside of radius by the shortest valid path.
If you do, **This turn:** That hero cannot move
back into radius with a movement action.

garrus.name: Hunt Down
garrus.description:
Before the attack: If you have exactly
one card in the discard, you may move
up to 3 spaces to a space adjacent to
an enemy hero and target that hero.
Otherwise, target a unit adjacent to you.

garrus.name: Battle Ready
garrus.description:
If there is an enemy hero in range,
you may retrieve a discarded card.
**End of the next turn:** May repeat once.

garrus.name: Form Testudo!
garrus.description:
**This round:** You and friendly units in
radius are immune to ranged actions
of enemy heroes outside of radius.
Cancel this effect if you move more than
2 spaces in a single turn, or fast travel.

garrus.name: Send Flying
garrus.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack:
you may move up to 3 spaces to a space
adjacent to the nearest enemy hero.
Push that hero up to 2 spaces.

garrus.name: Heavy Pilum
garrus.description:
An enemy hero in range, not adjacent
to you, discards a card, or is defeated.

hanu.name: Fight and Flight
hanu.description:
If your discard is empty, **choose one â€”**
>>An enemy hero adjacent to you discards a
>card, if able. You then move 2 spaces in a
>straight line, if able.
>>Defeat a non-heavy minion adjacent to you.

hanu.name: Fight or Flight
hanu.description:
If discard is empty, an adjacent
enemy hero discards a card, if able. You
then move 2 spaces in a straight line, if able.

hanu.name: Hurry up!
hanu.description:
If your discard is empty, set the printed
::initiative:: Initiative value of an unresolved card
of a hero in range to 11, until it is resolved.
**This turn:** If that hero performs a
movement action, that hero must move in
a straight line and the full distance, if able.

hanu.name: The Ultimate Trick
hanu.description:
You choose the action, and how
it is performed for a hero you
target with the "Hurry Up!".

hanu.name: Unexpected Journey
hanu.description:
Swap with an enemy hero in radius.
**This turn:** That hero is immune to all other
actions. **End of turn:** Swap with that hero,
regardless of radius, if able.

hanu.name: Helping Hand
hanu.description:
**Choose one â€”**
>>Target a unit adjacent to you.
>>Target a hero in range, adjacent to your
>friendly hero.

hanu.name: Little to Gain
hanu.description:
If yoy have no cards in the discard, block
the attack. Discard your unresolved card,
if you have one and and place yourself on
a spawn point in your throne zone, if able.
Each enemy hero gains 1 coin.

hanu.name: There and Back Again
hanu.description:
Swap with an enemy unit in radius.
**This turn:** That unit is immune to all other
actions. **End of turn:** Swap with that unit,
regardless of radius, if able.

hanu.name: Even the Odds
hanu.description:
**Choose one â€”**
>>Target a unit adjacent to you.
>>Target a hero in range, adjacent to your
>friendly hero.

hanu.name: Barely a Nuisance
hanu.description:
If yoy have no cards in the discard, block
the attack and place yourself on a spawn
point in your throne zone, if able.
Each enemy hero gains 1 coin.

hanu.name: This Way!
hanu.description:
A friendly hero in radius chooses a distance
of 1 or 2. You choose a direction. You both
move that number of spaces in the chosen
direction, stopping if an obstacle is reached.

hanu.name: Outnumber
hanu.description:
Target a unit in range. +1 ::attack_red:: Attack for
each friendly unit adjacent to you.

hanu.name: Hear Nothing
hanu.description:
Swap with an enemy hero in radius.
Move up to 1 space.

hanu.name: Safe Travels
hanu.description:
Swap with an enemy unit in radius.
**This turn:** You and that unit are immune to
all other actions. **End of turn:** Swap with
that unit, regardless of radius, if able.

hanu.name: Trusted Sidekick
hanu.description:
**Choose one, or both,** in any order **â€”**
>>Target a unit adjacent to you.
>>Target a hero in range, adjacent to your
>friendly hero and not adjacent to you.

hanu.name: Killing Joke
hanu.description:
If yoy have no cards in the discard, block the
attack and place yourself on a spawn point in
your throne zone, if able. If you do, retrieve
this card. Each enemy hero gains 1 coin.

hanu.name: That Way!
hanu.description:
A friendly hero in radius chooses a distance
of 1, 2, or 3. You choose a direction. You both
move that number of spaces in the chosen
direction, stopping if an obstacle is reached.

hanu.name: Pile On
hanu.description:
Target a unit in range. +1 ::attack_red:: Attack for each
friendly unit adjacent to you. If you target a
hero, may repeat once on a different target.

hanu.name: See Nothing
hanu.description:
Move up to 1 space. Swap with an enemy
hero in radius. Move up to 1 space.

ignatia.name: Chaos Bolt
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Target a minion in range,
not adjacent to you.
---
::tiebreaker_orange::: Target a hero in range,
not adjacent to you.
~(Effect is based on the visible side of the Tie Breaker coin).

ignatia.name: Unreliable Jolt
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Target an adjacent hero in range.
---
::tiebreaker_orange::: Target a non-adjacent hero in range.

ignatia.name: Moment of Equilibrium
ignatia.description:
Flip the Tie Breaker coin to a side of your
choice. **This turn and next turn:**
Do not flip the Tie Breaker coin after a tie.

ignatia.name: Chaos Incarnate
ignatia.description:
After you perform a primary action, you may
flip the Tie Breaker token to the other side
and repeat that action once, if able.

ignatia.name: Abrupt Combustion
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: An enemy hero in radius, adjacent to a
token, or a minion, discards a card, If able.
---
::tiebreaker_orange::: An enemy hero adjacent to you
discards a card, if able.

ignatia.name: Playing with Fire
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Target a hero in range, in a straight line.
---
::tiebreaker_orange::: Target a hero in range, not in a straight line.

ignatia.name: Path of Ashes
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Move up to 2 spaces in a straight line.
Place a ::token_magma:: magma token in each empty
space you moved through, or out of.
---
::tiebreaker_orange::: Place up to 2 magma tokens in radius
adjacent to another magma token, if able.

ignatia.name: Spontaneous Immolation
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: An enemy hero in radius, adjacent to a
token, or a minion, discards a card, If able.
---
::tiebreaker_orange::: An enemy hero adjacent to you
discards a card, if able.

ignatia.name: Erratic Fireblast
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Target a unit in range, in a straight line.
---
::tiebreaker_orange::: Target a unit in range, not in a straight line.

ignatia.name: Path of Cinders
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Move up to 3 spaces in a straight line.
Place a ::token_magma:: magma token in each empty
space you moved through, or out of.
---
::tiebreaker_orange::: Place up to 3 magma tokens in radius
adjacent to another magma token, if able.

ignatia.name: Searing Heat
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Move an enemy unit adjacent
to you up to 3 spaces.
---
::tiebreaker_orange::: Move an enemy unit in radius, and not
adjacent to you, up to 1 spaces.

ignatia.name: Crack of Doom
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Target a unit at a maximum range.
---
::tiebreaker_orange::: Target a unit adjacent to you.

ignatia.name: Unstable Portal
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Swap with a friendly unit in radius.
---
::tiebreaker_orange::: Swap with an enemy unit in radius.

ignatia.name: Violent Conflagration
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: An enemy hero in radius,
adjacent to a token, or a minion,
discards a card, or is defeated.
---
::tiebreaker_orange::: An enemy hero adjacent to you
discards a card, or is defeated.

ignatia.name: Loosely-Aimed Firebolts
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Target a unit in range, in a straight line.
May repeat once on a different hero.
---
::tiebreaker_orange::: Target a unit in range, not in a straight line.

ignatia.name: Path of Flames
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Move up to 4 spaces in a straight line.
Place a ::token_magma:: magma token in each empty
space you moved through, or out of.
---
::tiebreaker_orange::: Place up to 4 magma tokens in radius
adjacent to another magma token, if able.

ignatia.name: Scorching Blaze
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Move an enemy unit adjacent to you
up to 4 spaces. May repeat once.
---
::tiebreaker_orange::: Move an enemy unit in radius, and not
adjacent to you, up to 2 spaces.

ignatia.name: Imminent Eruption
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Target a unit at a maximum range.
---
::tiebreaker_orange::: Target a unit adjacent to you.
May repeat once on a minion.

ignatia.name: Chaos Gate
ignatia.description:
::tiebreaker_blue::: Swap with a friendly unit in radius.
---
::tiebreaker_orange::: Swap with an enemy unit in radius.

min.name: Fast as Lightning
min.description:
Target a unit in range. After the attack:
Apply the "After the attack" text of your
resolved or discarded non-basic attack
card, using that card's values.
~(In case of a repeat, repeat the action on the other card).

min.name: Chop Down
min.description:
Cannot target minions.
After the attack: You may swap this card
with a resolved or discarded attack card
and apply that card's text.

min.name: Smoke Bomb
min.description:
Place a ::token_smoke_bomb:: smoke bomb token in radius.
Units can move through the smoke bomb.
Enemy heroes cannot target another unit
if there is a smoke bomb on a straight line
between them and the target.

min.name: Flurry of blows
min.description:
After you perform a movement action,
all enemy heroes adjacent to you
discard a card, if able.

min.name: Trip Mine
min.description:
Place 2 mine tokens, 1 ::token_blast:: blast and 1 ::token_dud::
dud, facedown in radius. Units may move
through them. After an enemy hero moves
through a mine, remove it. For every blast
removed, that hero discards a card, if able.

min.name: Crane Stance
min.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: Push an enemy
hero adjacent to you up to 1 space.

min.name: Poof!
min.description:
Swap with a mine, a grenade,
or a smoke bomb in radius.
If you do, block the attack.

min.name: Cluster Mine
min.description:
Place 3 mine tokens, 1 ::token_blast:: blast and 2 ::token_dud::
duds, facedown in radius. Units may move
through them. After an enemy hero moves
through a mine, remove it. For every blast
removed, that hero discards a card, if able.

min.name: Tiger Stance
min.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: Push an enemy hero
adjacent to you up to 2 spaces.

min.name: Vanish
min.description:
Swap with a mine, a grenade, or a
smoke bomb in radius. If you do, when
used as a defense, block the attack.

min.name: Death Grenade
min.description:
Place a ::token_grenade:: grenade token into a space in
range, not adjacent to you. **End of turn:**
An enemy hero adjacent to the grenade
discards a card, if able, remove the grenade.

min.name: Viper Stance
min.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the
attack: You may swap with a smoke
bomb or a mine in radius.

min.name: Inner Strength
min.description:
**This round:** While you have no cards in
the discard, double your item bonuses.

min.name: Mine Field
min.description:
Place 3 mine tokens, 2 ::token_blast:: blasts and 1 ::token_dud::
dud, facedown in radius. Units may move
through them. After an enemy hero moves
through a mine, remove it. For every blast
removed, that hero discards a card, if able.

min.name: Dragon Stance
min.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the
attack: Move up to 1 space to a space
adjacent to the target, if able. Push an
enemy hero adjacent to you up to 2 spaces.

min.name: Ruse
min.description:
Swap with a mine, a grenade, or a smoke
bomb in radius. If you do, when used as
a defense, block the attack and you may
retrieve a resolved or discarded silver card.

min.name: Holy Death Grenade
min.description:
Place a ::token_grenade:: grenade token into a space in
range, not adjacent to you. **End of turn:** An
enemy hero adjacent to the grenade discards
a card, or is defeated, remove the grenade.

min.name: Cobra Stance
min.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the
attack: You may swap with a smoke
bomb or a mine in radius. If you do,
may repeat once, on a different hero.

min.name: Perfect Self
min.description:
You may retrieve a discarded card.
**This round:** While you have no cards in
the discard, double your item bonuses.

misa.name: Watch Me Soar
misa.description:
You may move through obstacles.
**This turn:** You are immune to non-ranged
attacks and skills. Ignore the effects of
tokens. Other units may move through you.

You may move through obstacles.
**This turn:** You are immune to non-ranged
attacks and skills. Ignore the effects of
tokens. Other units may move through you.

misa.name: Swoop In
misa.description:
Place yourself into a space in radius,
adjacent to an enemy hero. **This turn:**
Heroes in radius must attack you, if able,
when performing an attack action. The first
time you discard a card, gain 2 coins.

misa.name: Power Overwhelming
misa.description:
You may move through obstacles.
Your actions with **"Next turn"**
active effects count as if they had a
**"This round"** active effect instead.

misa.name: Sudden Breeze
misa.description:
Move up to 3 spaces in a straight line
ignoring the obstacles.

misa.name: Challenge Accepted
misa.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: If the target defends
successfully, gain 2 coins.

misa.name: Focus
misa.description:
**Next turn:** After you resolve a skill,
you may repeat it once.

misa.name: Gust of Wind
misa.description:
Move up to 3 spaces in a straight line
ignoring obstacles. You may place 1 unit
moved through into a space adjacent to you.

misa.name: Matter of Honor
misa.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: If the target defends
successfully, gain 3 coins.

misa.name: Discipline
misa.description:
**Next turn:** After you resolve an attack or a
skill, you may repeat it once. Cannot attack
the same hero twice this way.

misa.name: Living Tornado
misa.description:
Swap two enemy units in radius,
not adjacent to you.

misa.name: Power Shot
misa.description:
Target a unit in range. After the attack: If the
target is not adjacent to you, you may move
it 1 space, to a space farther away from you.

misa.name: Dash and Slash
misa.description:
**Next turn:** The first enemy hero you move
through discards a card, if able. If a hero
discards a card this way, gain 1 coin.

misa.name: Crushing Squall
misa.description:
Move up to 4 spaces in a straight line
ignoring obstacles. You may place 1 unit
moved through into a space adjacent to you.

misa.name: Worthy Opponent
misa.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. If you target a
hero, that hero cannot choose to not defend.
After the attack: If the target defends
successfully, gain 4 coins.

misa.name: Mastery
misa.description:
**Next turn:** After you resolve an action,
you may repeat it once. Cannot attack
the same hero twice this way.

misa.name: Storm Spirit
misa.description:
Swap with an enemy unit in radius, not
adjacent to you, or swap two enemy
units in radius, not adjacent to you.

misa.name: Thunder Shot
misa.description:
Target a unit in range. After the attack:
If the target is not adjacent to you, you
may move it 1 space, to a space farther
away from you, up to two times.

misa.name: Death from Above
misa.description:
**Next turn:** The first enemy hero you
move through this turn discards a card,
or is defeated. If a hero discards a
card this way, gain 2 coin.

nebkher.name: Mind Grip
nebkher.description:
**Choose one â€”**
>>Perform the primary action of the card in
>the previous turn slot of an enemy hero in
>range; apply no item bonuses. If you would
>place a token, place an illusion token
>instead. Ignore effects that give markers.
>>Defeat a minion adjacent to you.

nebkher.name: Mind Probe
nebkher.description:
Perform the primary action of a non-attack
card in the previous turn slot of an enemy
hero in range; apply no item bonuses. If you
would place a token, place an illusion token
instead. Ignore effects that give markers.

nebkher.name: Diabolical Laughter
nebkher.description:
Laugh diabolically. If you do, **choose one â€”**
>>You swap with an illusion token in radius.
>>You swap with a friendly minion in radius.
>>You are defeated. Enemies gain no coins.
>>**Next turn:** Gain +2 ::initiative:: Initiative.

nebkher.name: What the Hell Are You?
nebkher.description:
If you would be defeated as part of your own
action, first defeat all enemy minions in radius
and enemy heroes in radius discard a card, or
are defeated. Spend no life counters.

nebkher.name: Imbue Doubt
nebkher.description:
A hero in radius must swap their unresolved
card with another card in their hand, if able.

nebkher.name: Assume Control
nebkher.description:
**Choose one â€”**
>>Before the attack: Move a friendly minion in
>range up to 3 spaces to a space adjacent to
>an enemy hero in range. Target that hero.
>>Target a minion adjacent to you.

nebkher.name: Fleeting Image
nebkher.description:
Place an ::token_illusion:: illusion token in radius.
**This round:** After an action makes you
discard a card, swap with an illusion token,
regardless of radius, then remove that token.
~(Complete the action causing the discard before the swap).

nebkher.name: Time to Reconsider
nebkher.description:
A hero in radius must swap their unresolved
card with another card in their hand, if able.

nebkher.name: Direct Control
nebkher.description:
**Choose one â€”**
>>Before the attack: Move a friendly minion in
>range up to 4 spaces to a space adjacent to
>an enemy hero in range. Target that hero.
>>Target a minion adjacent to you.

nebkher.name: Multiple Projections
nebkher.description:
Place up to 2 ::token_illusion:: illusion tokens in radius.
**This round:** After an action makes you
discard a card, swap with an illusion token,
regardless of radius, then remove that token.

nebkher.name: Crack in Reality
nebkher.description:
Split the board with a straight line of spaces
drawn through your space: **This turn:**
Units on either side of the line are immune to
actions of units on the opposite side of the line.

nebkher.name: Twist Fate
nebkher.description:
Target a unit in range. After the attack:
If you target a hero, you may swap any
two of their resolved cards.
~(Any active effects on the swapped cards are canceled).

nebkher.name: Phantasmal Warrior
nebkher.description:
Place an ::token_illusion:: illusion token in radius. **This**
**round:** While you are performing actions, the
illusion tokens count as friendly melee minions.

nebkher.name: An Illusion of Choice
nebkher.description:
A hero in radius must swap their unresolved
card with another card in their hand, if able.
May repeat once on the same Hero.

nebkher.name: Master of Puppets
nebkher.description:
**Choose one, or both**, in any order **â€”**
>>Before the attack: Move a friendly minion in
>range up to 4 spaces to a space adjacent to
>an enemy hero in range. Target that hero.
>>Target a minion adjacent to you.

nebkher.name: Master Of Illusions
nebkher.description:
Place up to 3 ::token_illusion:: illusion tokens in radius.
**This round:** After an action makes you
discard a card, swap with an illusion token,
regardless of radius, then remove that token.

nebkher.name: Shift Reality
nebkher.description:
Split the board with a straight line of spaces
drawn through your space: **This turn:** You are
immune to actions of units on either side of
the line. All other units are immune to actions
of units on the opposite side of the line.

nebkher.name: Devious Scheme
nebkher.description:
Target a unit in range. After the attack:
If you target a hero, you may swap
any two of their resolved, unresolved,
or discarded cards.

nebkher.name: Phantasmal Colossus
nebkher.description:
Place an ::token_illusion:: illusion token in radius. **This**
**round:** Illusion tokens are immune to enemy
actions. While you are performing actions, the
illusion tokens count as friendly melee minions.

sabina.name: Point Blank Shot
sabina.description:
Target a unit in range. After the attack: Push
the target 1 space if it is adjacent to you.
~(A unit pushed into an obstacle will stop. This is a valid push.)

sabina.name: Bang
sabina.description:
Cannot target minions. After the attack: If the
target is adjacent, push it 1 space, if able.

sabina.name: Back to Back
sabina.description:
You may swap with a friendly minion
adjacent to you. **This turn:** You and friendly
heroes in radius gain +1 ::defense_silver:: Defense
if adjacent to one or more friendly minions.

sabina.name: Big Sodding Gun
sabina.description:
Your basic attack has +2 ::range_gold:: Range and
+2 ::attack_gold:: Attack. If you push an enemy hero,
that hero discards a card, or is defeated.

sabina.name: Basic Drill
sabina.description:
**This round:** When you, or a friendly
hero, performs a basic attack, count all
friendly minions in radius, including
the immune ones, as ranged.

sabina.name: Quickdraw
sabina.description: Target a unit in range, not adjacent to you.

sabina.name: Command
sabina.description:
Move any 1 friendly minion in radius up to
2 spaces; ignore heavy minion immunity.
~(You may move a heavy minion with this skill).

sabina.name: Battle Drill
sabina.description:
**This round:** When you, or a friendly hero,
performs an attack, count all friendly minions in
radius, including the immune ones, as ranged.

sabina.name: Gunslinger
sabina.description:
Target a unit in range, not adjacent to you.
+2 ::attack_red:: Attack if the target hero
played an attack card this turn.
~(A revealed card is "played" even if it's not resolved yet.)

sabina.name: Control
sabina.description:
Move any 1 friendly minion in radius up to
3 spaces; ignore heavy minion immunity.

sabina.name: Close Support
sabina.description:
If you are adjacent to a friendly minion, an
enemy hero in radius discards a card, if able.

sabina.name: Shootout
sabina.description:
Target a unit in range. After the attack: If you
defeated a minion with this attack, and there
is no enemy hero in range, you may remove
a non-heavy enemy minion adjacent to you.
~(You gain no coins for removing a minion.)

sabina.name: Lead the Charge
sabina.description:
If you are adjacent to a friendly minion,
block the attack.

sabina.name: Field Promotion
sabina.description:
**This round:** When you, or a friendly hero,
performs an attack, count all friendly minions
in radius, including the immune ones,
as both melee and ranged.
~(This can reduce the defense total by up to 2 per minion.)

sabina.name: Dead Shot
sabina.description:
Target a unit in range. +2 ::attack_red:: Attack if the
target hero played an attack card this turn.

sabina.name: Tactical Advantage
sabina.description:
Move any 1 friendly minion in radius up to
3 spaces; ignore heavy minion immunity.
May repeat once.

sabina.name: Covering Fire
sabina.description:
If you are adjacent to a friendly minion,
an enemy hero in radius discards a
card, or is defeated.

sabina.name: Bullet Hell
sabina.description:
Target a unit in range. After the attack:
If you defeated a minion with this attack, and
there is no enemy hero in range, you may
remove a non-heavy enemy minion in range.

sabina.name: Plot Armor
sabina.description:
If you are adjacent to a friendly minion,
block the attack and **This turn:** You are
immune to all other enemy action.

silverarrow.name: Hit and Run
silverarrow.description:
Cannot attack if adjacent to
an enemy unit. Target a unit in range.
After the attack: You may fast travel, if able.

silverarrow.name: Keep the Distance
silverarrow.description:
Cannot attack if adjacent to an enemy unit.
Target an enemy hero. After the attack: You
may fast travel within the same zone, if able.

silverarrow.name: Trailblazer
silverarrow.description:
If you are not adjacent to an enemy unit, you
may move up to 4 spaces in a straight line to
a space not adjacent to an enemy unit.

silverarrow.name: Wild Hunt
silverarrow.description:
Each time before you perform an action
you may move 2 spaces in a straight line.

silverarrow.name: Grasping Roots
silverarrow.description:
**This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius adjacent
to terrain cannot fast travel, or move more
than 1 space with a movement action.

silverarrow.name: Snap Shot
silverarrow.description:
-2 ::range_red:: Range for every unit adjacent to the
target, including you. Target a hero in range,
or a minion adjacent to you and in range.
~(If your range is below 1, you cannot perform this action).

silverarrow.name: Disorient
silverarrow.description:
Move an enemy unit adjacent to you up
to 1 space. If you do, move up to that
number of spaces in a straight line.

silverarrow.name: Entangling Vines
silverarrow.description:
**This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius
adjacent to terrain, or to their friendly
hero, cannot fast travel, or move more than
1 space with a movement action.

silverarrow.name: Opportunity Shot
silverarrow.description:
-2 ::range_red:: Range for every unit adjacent to the
target, including you. Target a unit in range.

silverarrow.name: Divert Attention
silverarrow.description:
Move an enemy unit adjacent to you up
to 2 spaces. If you do, move up to that
number of spaces in a straight line.

silverarrow.name: Warning Shot
silverarrow.description:
If you are not adjacent to an enemy unit,
**End of turn:** An enemy hero in radius,
discards a card, if able.

silverarrow.name: Long Shot
silverarrow.description: Target a unit at maximum range.

silverarrow.name: Fae Healing
silverarrow.description:
If you are not adjacent to an enemy unit,
another hero in radius may retrieve a
discarded card.

silverarrow.name: Grappling Branches
silverarrow.description:
**This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius
adjacent to terrain, or to their friendly
unit, cannot fast travel, or move more
than 1 space with a movement action.

silverarrow.name: Clear Shot
silverarrow.description:
-2 ::range_red:: Range for every unit adjacent to the
target, including you. target a unit in range.

silverarrow.name: Lead Astray
silverarrow.description:
Move an enemy unit adjacent to you up
to 3 spaces. If you do, move up to that
number of spaces in a straight line.

silverarrow.name: Treetop Sentinel
silverarrow.description:
If you are not adjacent to an enemy unit,
**End of turn:** An enemy hero in radius,
discards a card or is defeated.

silverarrow.name: Rain of Arrows
silverarrow.description:
Target a unit at maximum range.
If you target a hero, may repeat
up to two times on different heroes.

silverarrow.name: Nature's Blessing
silverarrow.description:
If you are not adjacent to an enemy unit,
you and up to one hero in radius may
retrieve a discarded card.

swift.name: Reload!
swift.description:
Perform the primary action of the
resolved card in your previous turn slot.

Perform the primary action of the resolved
card in your previous turn slot.

swift.name: Bounce
swift.description:
Swap this card with a red or a gold card
in your hand or discard. If you do, you may
push an enemy unit adjacent to you 1 space,
then move 2 spaces in a straight line, if able.

swift.name: Bullet Time
swift.description:
After you perform any action on your gold
card, you may perform an action on your
gold card again; it can be the same action.
Cannot target the same enemy hero twice.

swift.name: Steam Jump
swift.description:
Place yourself into a space in a straight line
and at maximum radius. You may then push
an enemy unit adjacent to you 1 space.

swift.name: Snipe
swift.description:
Target a unit at maximum range,
and in a straight line.

swift.name: Suppress
swift.description:
An enemy hero in radius, not adjacent
to you and not adjacent to terrain, or a
token, discards a card, if able.

swift.name: Assault Jump
swift.description:
Place yourself into a space in a straight line in
radius and not adjacent to you. You may then
push an enemy unit adjacent to you 1 space.

swift.name: Prepared Shot
swift.description:
Target a unit in range, in a straight
line, and not adjacent to you.

swift.name: Pin Down
swift.description:
An enemy hero in radius, not adjacent
to you and not adjacent to terrain, or a
token, discards a card, if able.

swift.name: Tactical Jump
swift.description:
You may place yourself into a space in
radius not in a straight line from you.

swift.name: Shotgun
swift.description:
Target a unit in range. +3 ::attack_red:: Attack if you
target a unit adjacent to you. Before the
attack: Up to one enemy hero adjacent to
the target discards a card, if able.

swift.name: Steam Shroud
swift.description:
**Next turn:** Before you perform an action, you
may swap any two of your resolved cards.

swift.name: Drop Trooper
swift.description:
Place yourself into a space in a straight
line in radius. You may then push up to two
enemy units adjacent to you 1 space.

swift.name: Killshot
swift.description:
Target a unit in range, in a straight
line, and not adjacent to you.

swift.name: Killing Ground
swift.description:
An enemy hero in radius, not adjacent to
you and not adjacent to terrain, or a token,
discards a card, or is defeated.

swift.name: Steam Valkyrie
swift.description:
You may place yourself into a space in
radius not in a straight line from you.
You may then fast travel once, if able.

swift.name: Super-Shotgun
swift.description:
Target a unit in range. +3 ::attack_red:: Attack if you
target a unit adjacent to you. Before the
attack: Up to one enemy hero adjacent to
the target discards a card, or is defeated.

swift.name: Steam Cloud
swift.description:
**Next turn:** Before or After you perform
an action, you may swap any two
of your resolved cards.

tali.name: Turn to Ice
tali.description:
**Choose one â€”**
>>A hero in range with an unresolved card
>may choose to retrieve that card. If they
>do not, name a color. That hero discards
>a card of that color, if able.
>>Defeat a minion adjacent to you.

tali.name: Cold Touch
tali.description:
A hero in range with an unresolved card
may choose to retrieve that card. If they
do not, name a color. That hero discards
a card of that color, if able.

tali.name: Commune with Spirits
tali.description:
The nearest friendly hero names a color,
you may then **choose one â€”**
>>Discard a card of that color. If you do,
>perform any one action on that card.
>>Retrieve a discarded card of that color.

tali.name: Reign of Winter
tali.description:
Whenever an enemy hero in play
retrieves a card as a result of an action,
that hero discards a card, if able, and
you may retrieve your discarded card.

tali.name: Cold Snap
tali.description:
The nearest enemy hero in radius discards a
card, if able. **Next turn, after playing cards:**
That hero may retrieve a discarded card.

tali.name: Frost Dagger
tali.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack:
If you target a hero, that hero discards a card,
if able. **Next turn, after playing cards:**
That hero may retrieve that card.

tali.name: Glacial Barrier
tali.description:
Place an ::token_ice:: ice token in radius, adjacent
to another ice token, if able. Enemy
heroes have -1 ::initiative:: Initiative penalty for
every ice token they are adjacent to.

tali.name: Snowstorm
tali.description:
Name a color. The nearest enemy hero in
radius discards a card of that color, if able.
**Next turn, after playing cards:** That hero
may retrieve a discarded card of that color.

tali.name: Frost Spear
tali.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the
attack: If you target a hero, name a color.
That hero discards a card of that color,
if able. **Next turn, after playing cards:**
That hero may retrieve that card.

tali.name: Wall of Frost
tali.description:
Place up to 2 ::token_ice:: ice tokens in radius,
adjacent to another ice token, if able.
Enemy heroes have -1 ::initiative:: Initiative penalty
for every ice token they are adjacent to.

tali.name: Guardian Spirit
tali.description:
If you have a card in the discard,
a friendly hero in radius may
retrieve a discarded card.

tali.name: Spirit Wolf
tali.description:
If you have a card in the discard, target a
minion in range, or a hero adjacent to you.
Otherwise, target a unit adjacent to you.

tali.name: Ancestral Totem
tali.description:
Place a ::token_totem:: in radius.
If a friendly melee minion adjacent
to a totem would be defeated, you
may remove the totem instead.

tali.name: Blizzard
tali.description:
Name a color. The nearest enemy hero in
radius discards a card of that color, if able.
**End of next turn:** That hero may retrieve
a discarded card of that color.

tali.name: Frost Scepter
tali.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack:
If you target a hero, name a color. That hero
discards a card of that color, if able. **End of**
**next turn:** That hero may retrieve that card.

tali.name: Pack Ice
tali.description:
Place up to 3 ::token_ice:: ice tokens in radius,
adjacent to another ice token, if able.
Enemy heroes have -1 ::initiative:: Initiative penalty
for every ice token they are adjacent to.

tali.name: Vengeful Spirit
tali.description:
If you have a card in the discard,
you, or a friendly hero in radius,
may retrieve a discarded card.

tali.name: Spirit Bear
tali.description:
If you have a card in the discard,
target a unit in range. Otherwise,
target a unit adjacent to you.

tali.name: Venerated Totem
tali.description:
Place a ::token_totem:: in radius. If a
friendly minion adjacent to a totem would be
defeated, you may remove the totem instead.
Totems are immune to enemy actions.

tigerclaw.name: Blink Strike
tigerclaw.description:
Before the attack: Move 2 spaces in a straight
line through an enemy unit; target that unit.
~(If you cannot make this move, you cannot attack).

tigerclaw.name: Nimble Strike
tigerclaw.description:
Before the attack: Move 2 spaces in a straight
line through an enemy hero; target that hero.

tigerclaw.name: Blend Into Shadows
tigerclaw.description:
If you are adjacent to a terrain, place yourself
into a space in radius; if you do, **Next turn:**
You are immune to enemy attack actions.

tigerclaw.name: Cloak and Daggers
tigerclaw.description:
After you perform a basic action you may
repeat it once; if you repeat an attack
action, you cannot target the same unit.

tigerclaw.name: Hit and Run
tigerclaw.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may move 1 space.

tigerclaw.name: Light-Fingered
tigerclaw.description:
You may move 1 space.
Take 1 coin from an enemy hero adjacent
to you; if you do, you may move 1 space.

tigerclaw.name: Sidestep
tigerclaw.description: Block a ranged attack. You may move 1 space.

tigerclaw.name: Combat Reflexes
tigerclaw.description:
Before the attack: You may move 1 space.
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: If you did not move before
the attack, you may move 1 space.

tigerclaw.name: Pick Pocket
tigerclaw.description:
Move up to 2 spaces.
Take 1 coin from an enemy hero adjacent
to you; if you do, you may move 1 space.

tigerclaw.name: Parry
tigerclaw.description:
Block a non-ranged attack.
The attacker discards a card, if able.

tigerclaw.name: Backstab
tigerclaw.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you; If a friendly
unit is adjacent to the target, +2 ::attack_red:: Attack.
~(A "friendly unit" is another hero or a minion on your team).

tigerclaw.name: Poisoned Dagger
tigerclaw.description:
Give a hero in range a ::marker_poison:: poison marker.
The hero with the poison marker has
-1 ::initiative:: Initiative, -1 ::attack_silver:: Attack and -1 ::defense_silver:: Defense.

tigerclaw.name: Evade
tigerclaw.description:
Block a ranged attack.
You may move 1 space. You may retrieve
your resolved or discarded basic skill card.

tigerclaw.name: Leaping Strike
tigerclaw.description:
Before the attack: You may move 1 space.
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may move 1 space.

tigerclaw.name: Master Thief
Reposte
tigerclaw.description:
Block a non-ranged attack. The attacker
discards a card, or is defeated.

tigerclaw.name: Backstab with a Ballista
tigerclaw.description:
Target a unit in range;
If a friendly unit is adjacent to the target
+2 ::attack_red:: Attack and the target cannot
perform a primary action to defend.

tigerclaw.name: Poisoned Dart
tigerclaw.description:
Give a hero in range a ::marker_poison:: poison marker.
The hero with the poison marker has
-2 ::initiative:: Initiative, -2 ::attack_silver:: Attack and -2 ::defense_silver:: Defense.

trinkets.name: Rapid Deployment
trinkets.description:
**Choose one â€”**
>>You may remove the turret. Move up to 3
>spaces and place the Turret into a space
>adjacent to you. It counts as terrain.
>>An enemy hero in range of both you and
>the Turret discards a card, if able.
>>Defeat a minion in range of both you and
>the Turret.

trinkets.name: Ramshackle Turret
trinkets.description:
**Choose one â€”**
>>You may remove the turret. Move up to
>2 spaces and place the Turret into an
>adjacent space. It counts as terrain.
>>Enemy hero in range of both you and
>the Turret discards a card, if able.

trinkets.name: Salvage Parts
trinkets.description:
**Choose one â€”**
>>You may remove the Turret. Place the
>Turret into a space adjacent to you.
>It counts as terrain.
>>Remove the Turret. Move up to 3 spaces.

trinkets.name: Fortified Positions
trinkets.description:
Whenever you perform an action,
you can count any barrier token, or a
friendly minion, in play count as the Turret.

trinkets.name: Disruptor Jolt
trinkets.description:
**This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius of the
Turret cannot perform non-basic skills.

trinkets.name: Makeshift Minigun
trinkets.description:
Target a unit in range of both you and the
Turret. After the attack: **Next turn:**
Gain +1 ::range_red:: Range if you target a hero.

trinkets.name: Early Prototype
trinkets.description:
Swap yourself, a friendly unit, or a token,
in radius of the Turret, with the Turret.

trinkets.name: Disruptor Pulse
trinkets.description:
You may cancel skills with active effects
of enemies in radius of the Turret.
**This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius of
the Turret cannot perform skills.

trinkets.name: Gatling Gun
trinkets.description:
Target a unit in range of both you and the
Turret. After the attack: **Next turn:**
Gain +1 ::range_red:: Range; if you target a hero
with no cards in their hand with your
basic skill, defeat that hero, instead.

trinkets.name: Teleportation Device
trinkets.description:
Swap yourself, a friendly unit, or a token,
in radius of the Turret, with the Turret.

trinkets.name: Deployable Barrier
trinkets.description:
Place up to 2 ::token_barrier:: barrier tokens in radius of
the Turret and adjacent to another barrier
token, if able. You and friendly heroes gain
+1 ::defense_silver:: Defense for each adjacent barrier token.

trinkets.name: Steam Discharge
trinkets.description:
Target a unit in range of both you and the
Turret. After the attack: One other enemy
hero in range of you and adjacent to the
Turret discards a card, if able.

trinkets.name: Self-Destruct
trinkets.description:
Enemy heroes in radius of the Turret discard
a card, if able. Remove the Turret.

trinkets.name: Disruptor Grid
trinkets.description:
You may cancel skills with active effects
of enemies in radius of the Turret.
**This turn and next turn:** Enemies in
radius of the Turret cannot perform skills.

trinkets.name: Repeater Cannon
trinkets.description:
Target a unit in range of both you and the
Turret. After the attack: **Next turn:**
Gain +2 ::range_red:: Range; if you target a hero
with no cards in their hand with your
basic skill, defeat that hero, instead.

trinkets.name: Perfected Design
trinkets.description:
Swap yourself, any unit, or a token,
in radius of the Turret, with the Turret.

trinkets.name: Deployable Bastion
trinkets.description:
Place up to 3 ::token_barrier:: barrier tokens in radius of
the Turret and adjacent to another barrier
token, if able. You and friendly heroes gain
+1 ::defense_silver:: Defense for each adjacent barrier token.

trinkets.name: Flame Belcher
trinkets.description:
Target a unit in range of both you and the
Turret. After the attack: One other enemy
hero in range of both you and the Turret
discards a card, if able.

trinkets.name: Emergency Protocol
trinkets.description:
Enemy heroes in radius of the Turret discard
a card, or are defeated. Remove the Turret.

ursafar.name: Claws That Catch
ursafar.description:
Before the attack: If you are enraged and
not adjacent to an enemy unit, move up to
1 space. Target a unit adjacent to you. After
the attack: **This round:** You are enraged.

ursafar.name: Jaws That Bite
ursafar.description:
Before the attack: If you are enraged and
not adjacent to an enemy unit, move up to
1 space. Target a hero adjacent to you. After
the attack: **This round:** You are enraged.

ursafar.name: Angry Roar
ursafar.description:
Push enemy minions adjacent to
you up to 1 space. If enraged, you
may retrieve a resolved attack card.
**This round:** You are enraged.

ursafar.name: Unbound Fury
ursafar.description:
You are always enraged. While an active
effect of one or more other cards is also
making you enraged, gain +2 ::movement_silver:: Movement.

ursafar.name: Prowling Brute
ursafar.description:
If enraged, after you perform this action, you
may swap with a minion adjacent to you.
~(You may choose to move 0 spaces and still swap).

ursafar.name: Prey Drive
ursafar.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. Before the
attack: If you are enraged and target a hero,
you may remove an enemy minion in radius.
**This round:** You are enraged.

ursafar.name: Sniff Out
ursafar.description:
If not enraged, **This round:** You are enraged;
otherwise, an enemy hero in range, not
adjacent to you, or to another unit,
discards a card, if able.

ursafar.name: Rampaging Beast
ursafar.description:
If enraged, after you perform this
action, you may swap with a unit
or a token adjacent to you.

ursafar.name: Prey Abundance
ursafar.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. Before the
attack: If you are enraged and target a hero,
you may remove an enemy minion in radius.
**This round:** You are enraged.

ursafar.name: Eyes on the Prey
ursafar.description:
If not enraged, **This round:** You are enraged;
otherwise, an enemy hero in range, not
adjacent to you, or to another unit,
discards a card, if able.

ursafar.name: Hulking Menace
ursafar.description:
If enraged, **this round:** Enemy units cannot
move through spaces adjacent to you.
~(They can move into, or out of those spaces, but not both).

ursafar.name: Rip
ursafar.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the
attack: If you are enraged, and the
target was defeated, gain 1 extra coin.
**This round:** you are enraged.

ursafar.name: Instinctive Reaction
ursafar.description:
If not enraged, **This round:** You are enraged;
otherwise, **choose one â€”**
>>Perform an action on your discarded card.
>>You may retrieve a discarded card.

ursafar.name: Unstoppable Force
ursafar.description:
If enraged, before or after you
perform this action, you may swap
with a unit or a token adjacent to you.

ursafar.name: Feeding Frenzy
ursafar.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. Before the
attack: If you are enraged and target a hero,
you may remove an enemy minion in radius.
**This round:** You are enraged.
May repeat once on a different target hero.

ursafar.name: Apex Predator
ursafar.description:
If not enraged, **This round:** You are enraged;
otherwise, an enemy hero in range, not
adjacent to you, or to another unit,
discards a card, or is defeated.

ursafar.name: Immovable Object
ursafar.description:
If enraged, **this round:** Enemy units cannot
move through spaces adjacent to you. You
cannot be placed, pushed, moved, swapped,
or forced to move by enemy heroes. Ignore the
effects that limit, reduce, or prevent movement.

ursafar.name: Tear
ursafar.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack:
If you are enraged, and the target was
defeated, gain 3 extra coins; If a hero was
defeated, that hero spends 1 extra ::life_counters:: Life
counter. **This round:** you are enraged.

ursafar.name: Evolutionary Response
ursafar.description:
If not enraged, **This round:** You are enraged;
otherwise, **choose one, or both â€”**
>>Perform an action on your discarded card.
>>You may retrieve a discarded card.

wasp.name: Dazzling Dagger
wasp.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the
 attack: Cancel active effects on skill
 cards of enemy heroes adjacent to you.
 **This turn:** Enemy heroes adjacent to
 you cannot perform skill actions.

wasp.name: Depleted Dagger
wasp.description:
Cannot target minions. After the attack:
**This turn:** Adjacent enemy heroes
cannot perform Skills.

wasp.name: Static Barrier
wasp.description:
**This turn:** Enemy units in radius cannot
move or fast travel out of radius.
Enemy units outside of radius cannot
move or fast travel into radius.

wasp.name: Thunder and Lightning
wasp.description:
After you perform a basic skill one enemy
hero in play discards a card, if able.

wasp.name: Lift Up
wasp.description:
Move a unit or a token not adjacent to
you and in radius, up to 1 space, without
moving it away from you, or closer to you.

wasp.name: Shock
wasp.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. Before the
attack: Up to one enemy hero adjacent to you,
except the target, discards a card, if able.

wasp.name: Stop Projectiles
wasp.description:
If the attacker is not adjacent
to you, block a ranged attack.

wasp.name: Control Gravity
wasp.description:
Move a unit or a token not adjacent to
you and in radius, up to 1 space, without
moving it away from you, or closer to you.
May repeat once.

wasp.name: Electrocute
wasp.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. Before the
 attack: Up to one enemy hero in radius,
 except the target, discards a card, if able.
~(Even though there is a radius icon, this is a non-ranged attack
~and the original target of the attack must be adjacent to you.)

wasp.name: Deflect Projectiles
wasp.description:
If the attacker is not adjacent to you,
block a ranged the attack. If you do, the
attacker discards a card, if able.

wasp.name: Kinetic Repulse
wasp.description:
Push every enemy unit adjacent to you 2
spaces; each enemy hero that was stopped
by an obstacle discards a card, if able.

wasp.name: Charged Boomerang
wasp.description:
Target a unit in range, not in a straight line.
~(Adjacent units are in a straight line as well).

wasp.name: Telekinesis
wasp.description:
Place a unit or a token in range, which is not
in a straight line, into a space adjacent to you.

wasp.name: Center of Mass
wasp.description:
Move a unit or a token not adjacent to
you and in radius, up to 1 space, without
moving it away from you, or closer to you.
May repeat up to two times.

wasp.name: Electroblast
wasp.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. Before the attack:
Up to one enemy hero in radius, except the
target, discards a card, or is defeated.

wasp.name: Reflect Projectiles
wasp.description:
If the attacker is not adjacent to you, block a
ranged attack. If you do, the attacker discards
a card, if able, **This turn:** You are immune to
ranged attacks of heroes not adjacent to you.

wasp.name: Kinetic Blast
wasp.description:
Push every enemy unit adjacent to you
3 spaces; each enemy hero that was stopped
by an obstacle discards a card, if able.

wasp.name: Thunder Boomerang
wasp.description:
Target a unit in range, not in a straight line.
If you defeat an enemy hero, may repeat once.

wasp.name: Mass Telekinesis
wasp.description:
Place a unit or a token in range, which
is not in a straight line, into a space
adjacent to you. May repeat once.

whisper.name: Swift Justice
whisper.description:
**Choose one â€”**
>>An enemy hero in range discards a card,
>if able; then, if able, that hero moves the
>number of spaces equal to that card's
>printed movement value in a straight line.
>>Defeat a minion adjacent to you.

whisper.name: Vile Accusation
whisper.description:
An enemy hero in range discards a card,
if able; then, if able, that hero moves the
number of spaces equal to that card's
printed movement value in a straight line.

whisper.name: Death Seeker
whisper.description:
If an enemy hero in radius has a card
in the discard, **choose one â€”**
>>**This turn:** You are immune to attacks.
>>You may retrieve a discarded card.

whisper.name: Grim Reaper
whisper.description:
After you perform a basic action,
you may repeat it once, chosing
the same, or a different option.

whisper.name: Cause Fear
whisper.description:
Move up to 3 enemy minions in radius
up to 1 space in the same direction.

whisper.name: Blood Trail
whisper.description:
Before the attack: Move up to 1 space for
every empty minion spawn point in radius
in the battle zone, up to a maximum of
2 spaces, then target a unit adjacent to you.

whisper.name: Shadow Step
whisper.description:
Place yourself into an empty minion
spawn point in range in the battle zone.

whisper.name: Instill Dread
Crimson Thirst
whisper.description:
Before the attack: Move up to 1 space for
every empty minion spawn point in radius
in the battle zone, up to a maximum of
2 spaces, then target a unit adjacent to you.

whisper.name: Shadow Walk
whisper.description:
Place yourself into an empty minion
spawn point in range in the battle zone.

whisper.name: Lesser Evil
whisper.description:
An enemy hero in range **chooses one â€”**
>>That hero discards a card, if able.
>>You defeat a minion adjacent to you.

whisper.name: Sense Blood
whisper.description:
Target a hero in range with a card in the
discard, or a unit adjacent to you.

whisper.name: No Escape
whisper.description:
If an enemy hero in radius has a card
in the discard, +2 ::movement_green:: Movement.

whisper.name: Strike Terror
Sanguine Fury
whisper.description:
Before the attack: Move up to 2 spaces for
every empty minion spawn point in radius
in the battle zone, up to a maximum of
4 spaces, then target a unit adjacent to you.

whisper.name: Creeping Shadow
whisper.description:
Place yourself into an empty minion spawn
point in range in the battle zone, or into a
space in range adjacent to that spawn point.

whisper.name: Greater Good
whisper.description:
An enemy hero in range **chooses one â€”**
>>That hero discards a card, or is defeated.
>>You defeat up to 3 minions adjacent to you.

whisper.name: Blind Frenzy
whisper.description:
Target a hero in range with a card in the
discard, or a unit adjacent to you.
May repeat once on an different hero.

whisper.name: Dark Stalker
whisper.description:
If an enemy hero in radius has a card
in the discard, +3 ::movement_green:: Movement.

wuk.name: Tree Slam
wuk.description:
If you are adjacent to a tree token, target
a unit in range, otherwise, target a minion
adjacent to you. After the attack:
If the target was adjacent to you, move it
1 space to a space adjacent to you, if able.

wuk.name: Makeshift Weapon
wuk.description:
Cannot attack if you are not adjacent to a tree
token. Target a unit in range. After the attack:
If the target was adjacent to you, move it 1
space to a space adjacent to you, if able.

wuk.name: Mystic Saplings
wuk.description:
Place up to 3 ::token_tree:: tree tokens in radius, not
adjacent to a tree token. Heroes may move
through a space with a tree token. Do not
remove the tree tokens at the end of round.

wuk.name: March of Nature
wuk.description:
Tree tokens in the battle zone count as
melee minions immune to ranged attacks
as long as they are adjacent to you.

wuk.name: Gifts of Nature
wuk.description:
If you are adjacent to a tree, you
may retrieve a discarded card.

wuk.name: Nature's Protector
wuk.description:
Target a unit in range,
adjacent to a tree token.

wuk.name: Toss Away
wuk.description:
Move up to 1 space. Push token adjacent
to you up to 3 spaces. If the token is pushed
2 or more spaces, an enemy hero adjacent
to that token discards a card, if able.

wuk.name: Tree of Plenty
wuk.description:
Either you, or a hero in radius, may
retrieve a discarded card if either
of you are adjacent to a tree.

wuk.name: Nature's Guardian
wuk.description:
Target a unit in range,
adjacent to a tree token.

wuk.name: Mighty Throw
wuk.description:
Move up to 1 space. Push a token or a minion
adjacent to you up to 4 spaces. If it is pushed
2 or more spaces, an enemy hero adjacent to
that token or a minion discards a card, if able.

wuk.name: Claim Dominance
wuk.description:
**This round:** Up to 1 non-immune enemy
minion adjacent to you does not count
towards the minion total during minion battle.

wuk.name: Trample
wuk.description:
If you move in a straight line: You may ignore
obstacles; if you moved through an enemy
hero, that hero discards a card, or is defeated;
defeat up to 1 minion you moved through.

wuk.name: Into the Canopy
wuk.description:
Swap with a tree token in radius.
You may then place a minion adjacent to
that tree token into a space adjacent to you.

wuk.name: Abundance
wuk.description:
Both you and a friendly hero in radius
may retrieve a discarded card if either
of you are adjacent to a tree.

wuk.name: Nature's Champion
wuk.description:
Target a unit in range, adjacent to a tree
token. May repeat once, on a different hero.

wuk.name: Monstrous Throw
wuk.description:
Move up to 1 space. Push a unit or a token
adjacent to you up to 5 spaces. If it is pushed
2 or more spaces, an enemy hero adjacent
to that unit or token discards a card, if able.

wuk.name: Assert Dominance
wuk.description:
**This round:** Up to 2 enemy minion adjacent
to you do not count towards the minion total
during minion battle, regardless of immunity.

wuk.name: Angry Stampede
wuk.description:
If you move in a straight line: You may ignore
obstacles; if you moved through an enemy
hero, that hero discards a card, or is defeated;
defeat up to 2 minion you moved through.

wuk.name: Treetop Ride
wuk.description:
Swap with a tree token in radius.
You may then place a minion adjacent to that
tree token into a space adjacent to you.

xargatha.name: Backlash
xargatha.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. After the attack:
**This turn:** After you discard a card for any
reason, perform the primary action on an
attack card in your discard, if able.
~(First complete the action causing the discard).

xargatha.name: Counter-Swing
xargatha.description:
Cannot target minions.
**This turn:** After you discard a card for any
reason, perform the primary action on an
attack card in your discard, if able.

xargatha.name: Siren's Call
xargatha.description:
Target the nearest non-immune enemy unit
in range not adjacent to you; move that unit
up to 2 spaces along the shortest valid path
towards you. May repeat once.

xargatha.name: Metamorphosis
xargatha.description:
You may move through obstacles.
Before you perform an action, one enemy
hero adjacent to you discards a card, if able.

xargatha.name: Stone Gaze
xargatha.description:
**This turn:** The nearest enemy heroes
in radius are immune, cannot perform a
movement action, and count as terrain.
~(Will affect multiple heroes if they are at the same distance.)

xargatha.name: Dangerous Slash
xargatha.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. +1 ::attack_red:: Attack
for every enemy unit adjacent to you.
~(Count all enemy units, including the target).

xargatha.name: Charming Aura
xargatha.description:
**This round:** Enemy melee minions
in radius count as friendly when
calculating the defense totals.

xargatha.name: Petrifying Stare
xargatha.description:
**This turn:** The nearest enemy heroes
in radius are immune, cannot perform a
movement action, and count as terrain.

xargatha.name: Deadly Swipe
xargatha.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. +2 ::attack_red:: Attack
for every enemy unit adjacent to you.

xargatha.name: Aura of Control
xargatha.description:
**This round:** Enemy ranged and melee
minions in radius count as friendly when
calculating the defense totals.

xargatha.name: Fresh Converts
xargatha.description:
If you are adjacent to a minion,
you may retrieve a discarded card.

xargatha.name: Long Thrust
xargatha.description: Target a unit in range, not adjacent to you.

xargatha.name: Constrict
xargatha.description:
**Next turn:** Enemy heroes adjacent to you
cannot move, except when performing a
movement action on a gold card or a red card.

xargatha.name: Turn into Statues
xargatha.description:
**This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius are
immune, cannot perform a movement
action, and count as terrain.

xargatha.name: Lethal Spin
xargatha.description:
Target a unit adjacent to you. +3 ::attack_red:: Attack
for every enemy unit adjacent to you.

xargatha.name: Aura of Domination
xargatha.description:
**This round:** All enemy minions in radius,
including the immune ones, count as
friendly when calculating the defense totals.

xargatha.name: Devoted Followers
xargatha.description:
If you are adjacent to a minion, you may
retrieve a discarded card and **This turn:**
You are immune to attack actions.

xargatha.name: Rapid Thrusts
xargatha.description:
Target a unit in range, not adjacent to you.
After the attack: If you are adjacent to
an enemy hero, may repeat once
on a different target unit.

xargatha.name: Deadly Embrace
xargatha.description:
**Next turn:** Enemy heroes adjacent to you
cannot move, except when performing a
movement action on a gold card.
